channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Bad design might simply be obsolete design
item.description: Perhaps you’ve encountered a sink with two taps, not one. One for hot, one for cold, without a chance to mix them before you scald or chill yourself. ...

item.title: You are a media theorist
item.description: If you’ve ever caught a ball, you’re a physicist. You might not be trained in it, but your intuitive sense of where the ball is going to land requires...

item.title: Invisible Windows Rootkit Hides Dangerous Files Using This Prefix
item.description: This invisible rootkit threat stores scripts in the Windows Registry and can hide malicious files and tasks behind this prefix—what you need to know.

item.title: Ubisoft Has Everything Riding On ‘Assassin’s Creed Shadows’
item.description: With Ubisoft's value precipitously declining in the last five years, so much is riding on Assassin's Creed Shadows.

item.title: ‘The White Lotus’ Season 3 Has Turned Out To Be Bad
item.description: As a huge fan of The White Lotus, and almost every cast member added for season 3, I have been slowly sinking into an unexpected feeling. Season 3 is ...

item.title: Asking for directions
item.description: It hadn’t happened in such a long time that I hesitated to respond. As I was walking through town, a driver pulled up, rolled down his window and said...

item.title: The big sort
item.description: The phone book was a groundbreaking innovation. For the first time, you could actually look up the person you were seeking to reach. At about the same...

item.title: There Is No ‘The Electric State 2,’ But There May, Somehow, Be A Show
item.description: Will there be an Electric State 2? No, but there may actually be a Netflix show to air after this movie has its run.

item.title: Updated Switch 2 Document Suddenly Confirms Nintendo’s AI Plans
item.description: An updated patent spoils Nintendo plans for using AI on the Switch 2, but it's also a warning to downscale our expectations.

item.title: Decoding the Knock Knock situation
